info.title: Leap API Documentation
info.description:
Welcome to the Leap API Documentation. This comprehensive guide will help you understand and integrate with our customer management system.

## Getting Started

1. **Authentication**: Use Bearer token authentication for all API requests
2. **Base URL**: Configure your base URL in the top bar
3. **Customer Management**: Use the Customer endpoints to manage customer data

## Key Features

- **Customer CRUD Operations**: Create, read, update customer information
- **Flexible Data Structure**: Support for both individual and commercial customers
- **Rich Metadata**: Track canvassers, call center reps, and management companies
- **Search and Filter**: Advanced querying capabilities

## API Structure

This API follows RESTful principles and uses standard HTTP methods:
- `GET` - Retrieve data
- `POST` - Create new resources
- `PUT` - Update existing resources
- `DELETE` - Remove resources

## Response Format

All responses are returned in JSON format with appropriate HTTP status codes.

## Rate Limiting

Please be mindful of rate limits when making API requests.

## Support

For additional support, please contact our development team.
